Here is the list of scores for each sign at $line, along with a brief description:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Loyal and adventurous, but can be impulsive and reckless.
2. Taurus - 8/10 - Reliable and practical, but can be stubborn and materialistic.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Curious and communicative, but can be scattered and unreliable.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Nurturing and emotional, but can be moody and overly attached.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and charismatic, but can be prideful and dominant.
6. Virgo - 9/10 - Analytical and hardworking, but can be critical and perfectionistic.
7. Libra - 7/10 - Diplomatic and social, but can be indecisive and people-pleasing.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and perceptive, but can be intense and secretive.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, but can be blunt and tactless.
10. Capricorn - 7/10 - Disciplined and ambitious, but can be serious and authoritarian.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian and independent, but can be unpredictable and rebellious.
12. Pisces - 8/10 - Compassionate and imaginative, but can be dreamy and unreliable.
Note: These scores are subjective and based on general trends and characteristics associated with each sign. Individual personalities may vary!
